articles.title: Death of pregnant woman ignites debate about abortion ban in Poland - CNN
articles.description: The death of a pregnant Polish woman has reignited debate over abortion in one of Europe's most devoutly Catholic countries, with activists saying she could still be alive if it were not for a near total ban on terminating pregnancies.

articles.title: Lydia Ko lights it up in third round blitz - RNZ
